awards.title: Poster Award at the 21st Military Operations Research and Modeling & Simulation Forum
awards.description: HRC Lab received a poster award at the 21st Military Operations Research and Modeling & Simulation Forum.

awards.title: Excellence Award at the 25th Golden Silicon Awards
awards.description: Three HRC Lab members received the excellence award at the 25th Golden Silicon Awards with their project on Application of Multimodal Language Models in Food Consultation and Edge Computing Implementation.

events.title: Demonstration at the 21st Military Operations Research and Modeling & Simulation Forum
events.description: HRC Lab demonstrated immersive remote operation system robotic technology at the forum co-hosted by the Ministry of National Defense Integration Assessment Division and National Tsing Hua University Defense Technology Research Center.

events.title: Visitors from Yonsei University
events.description: A group of faculty members from Yonsei University visited the HRC Lab to learn about ongoing research and participate in hands-on demonstrations, including the integration of the Stretch 3 robot with VR teleoperation systems.

events.title: Visitors from the University of Toronto
events.description: Three visitors from the University of Toronto visit the HRC Lab to experience an interactive demonstration of our VR teleoperation robot.
